//help page Click any image in this page to view it in full resolution. Image zoom
What you need to use mods You need two apps: Minecraft Pocket Edition (the full version, the demo doesn't work with mods) and BlockLauncher (the free version or the pro version). Get it on the Play Store
How to prepare mods First download the mod that you want to use. To download the mod you can press the "Download this mod from Desno's website" button to go to the website where you can download the mod, remember to read carefully the "Instructions" section in the website (mods have a different installation method). Usually mods are inside a zip file so you will need a File Manager to extract it (there are a lot of file managers available on the Google Play Store). Get one on the Play Store Extracting is really easy: you have to go to the "Download" folder with your file manager, click the .zip file that contains everything you need to use the mod (usually the icon of the .zip file is an archive) and then extract it. This is an example of the Portal 2 Mod zip file after extraction:
How to install mods Now that you did all the previous steps you can open BlockLauncher, click the "Settings" icon and go to "Manage ModPE Scripts". Make sure the switch in the upper right is ON and click the "Import" button. Import the script from local storage (the script is the .js file that you should have found in the .zip file).
How to install a texture pack Some mods inside the .zip file have a texture pack.
To install it open BlockLauncher, click the "Settings" icon and go to "Launcher options". Go in the "Texture Pack" section and make sure the switch in the upper right is ON. Then press the "Select" button and choose the texture pack that was extracted from the first .zip file.
//guns page DesnoGuns Mod Guns. Weapons. Explosions. This is the DesnoGuns Mod! :D
//portal 2 page Portal 2 Mod This mod tries to bring the features of the famous PC game “Portal” in Minecraft Pocket Edition.
With this mod you can craft the Portal Gun and then shoot!
You can teleport yourself everywhere with these portals.
There are five different Portal Guns with different characteristics.
In this mod you can find also other items taken from the game “Portal”: Long Fall Boots, Jumpers, Gels. And many other features will come out in future updates.
//laser page Laser Mod • The laser of the Laser Gun destroys the block that you are looking.
• The Laser Bazooka shoot a laser bullet that will explode when it touches the ground.
• The Laser Sniper Rifle shoot a laser bullet that kill almost every mob it hit.
• Tap the settings icon to open the UI with Information and Settings for the mod.
• There are a lot of settings for the weapons, so you can personalize them.
• You can find the Laser Weapons also in the creative inventory.
//turrets page Turrets Mod • Craft a turret and place it where you want, then make it aggressive with the “Turret options” item and the turret will start to shoot every selected mob that come in his range.
• There is an option to change the name of the turret.
• Protect your home with your turrets! ;)
//jukebox page Jukebox Mod • There are twelve different discs with twelve different songs (songs are ported from Minecraft PC).
• Tap the jukebox with a disc and it will start playing the chosen song.
• Greater the distance between you and the Jukebox, lower the volume of it.
• Support multiple jukeboxes that play simultaneously.
• There is a random chance of finding a disc every 30 kills of hostile mobs.
• Tap the Jukebox to eject the disc. When the song ends the disc will be ejected automatically.
• The Jukebox block and the discs are also in the creative inventory.
• The crafting recipes of the Jukebox are the same of the PC version.
//unreal map page Unreal Geometry Map This map and the mod attached bring the Non-Euclidean geometry on your mobile device!
Experience the craziness of an unreal world, in a normal/Euclidean game like Minecraft.
Words can\’t explain in a good way what this map has.
Try it, you'll see.
